casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Reginald WIGGINS, Appellant. Court of Appeals of New York. December 12, 2017

Motion by JustLeadershipUSA for leave to file a brief amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Three copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
